channel.title: Just a quick question
channel.description:
I am using the DELTA source and the moparscape client.
But when i run the source and the client and try to log in using random user and PW it says it cant find character profile. In my character folder i dont have anything. How do i make a character profile?? So that i can log in.
Just using default IP.

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

So, should i be using DELTA latest client v11?

I will download it

EDIT: ALl fixed. I am using the Re-Uploaded v2 allstar base. Turned out to be a big success. Just gotta edit it now

Thanks for your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well you shouldn’t use moparscapes client with a delta based server.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

I have tryed others too. Sometimes it appears the same problem occurs. Is it the server source or the client?

EDIT:

Would this one be ok?? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434654.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You should find another server if you can’t fix this one. Have a look around the download section.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

So, When i run the server… With Nothing in my Characters Folder it logs in for like 2 seconds and then says “failed to find character profile”. When i make a Character profile like that other guy told me to do it says “Invalid user/Password”.

What do i need to post here, for you to be able to fix the problem.

Please tell me really simply because i am really really really new to java programming.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well… Delta is the simplest.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

Delta is all too confusing. Can you suggest a server to download from here that is like the most simplest for beginners?

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Just post the fist 10-15 lines of public int loadGame(String playerName, String playerPass) {

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:341862”]No. What he just gave you was nothing but fail…
Your server should be making new character files if it can’t find the old one. Look in public int loadgame, I bet that’s where your problem is.[/quote]

Im not very good with JAVA lol. Can you explain to me how to do that and what to look at… and how to get to that file ect.

Or if that is too hard, can you maybe tell me another good base that is easier to use?

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

umm… maybe? try it
if it fails than you can still delete the file

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

No. What he just gave you was nothing but fail…
Your server should be making new character files if it can’t find the old one. Look in public int loadgame, I bet that’s where your problem is.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

So, no mater what server BASE/SOURCE you are using… should this still work…

Like will it work with the delta server base??

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

make a new file in text document. Name the text document to your character’s name
this is mine for starters, just post this into the text document.

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = your username
character-password = your password
character-reason = 

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3538
character-posy = 3316
character-rights = 3
character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1
character-playerconnectcheck = 127.0.0.1
character-special = 100
character-tz = -1
character-publicchat = 0
character-privatechat = 0
character-tradecompete = 0
character-clue = 0
character-cluekill = 0
character-starter = 1
character-donate = 0
character-pouch1 = 0
